Works.Title:
How does our language

learning tool work?
Works.T1: Create new words with just one click!
Works.T3: Take quizzes and reinforce new words in your vocabulary.
Works.T4: Track your progress and expand your vocabulary!

Paradox.Title: A strange paradox‚Ä¶ üòµ‚Äçüí´
Paradox.Desc1: Remembering individual words is harder than learning through sentence examples. Examples help the brain retain information faster and for longer.
Paradox.Desc2: This is exactly what we do at Syncword. We explain words through examples and show them in context.

Card1.Title: All in one click:
Card1.Desc: Enter a word, and we instantly show its translation and usage examples.

Card2.Title: Convenient repetition:
Card2.Desc: You can repeat words anytime, which helps to remember them better.

Card3.Title: Accurate translation:
Card3.Desc: Our translations are created using powerful AI, much more accurate than regular translators.

Card4.Title: Only the necessary information:
Card4.Desc: You will receive only the necessary information without unnecessary details.

FAQ.Q1: What do I need to do to get started?
FAQ.A1: To get started, simply register on our website using your Google account‚Äîit only takes three clicks! After that, you can easily add new words to the system. Our interface is designed to be easy to use.
FAQ.A2: Yes, our service is free forever. While there are some limitations in the free plan, it's perfect for getting started. You can learn up to 100 words per month effortlessly. If you need more, you can always upgrade to the premium plan for 7 euros.
FAQ.Q3: How much time should I spend learning?
FAQ.A3: Creating new cards takes about a minute or even less. We recommend using the 'Games' feature for reviewing and reinforcing words. It takes just 20-30 minutes a day and allows you to learn new words effectively.
FAQ.A4: No, Vocabraze is an online service accessible from any device with a browser. Just visit our website using your browser and start learning!

CTA.Title: Start learning now
CTA.Desc: The app is completely free, no trial period. One-click registration through Google!

Guide.Main: How to get a good result?
Guide.1: - Write the word in the language:
Guide.2: - Write the word without grammatical changes
Guide.3: - If possible, write only the word or a short phrase
